0P00000DWN.F.manager_bio: Marcus Stahlhacke is Head of Retail Active Allocation in Allianz Global Investors Multi Asset Europe and is also Team Lead of the Retail Multi Channel team therein. He joined the company in 1996 as portfolio manager for balanced portfolios. He was Head of Fixed Income / Benchmark Analysis from 1998 for several years before being appointed as Senior Product Advisor of the Product Advisory division in November 2001. From 2005 to 2010 Marcus Stahlhacke was CIO Systematic Multi Asset-Multi Manager and headed the Fund-of-Funds team. Prior to joining the Multi Asset - Active Allocation team in February 2012, Marcus was CIO - Real Estate Private Clients at Allianz Global Investors. Marcus studied at the universities of Frankfurt und Southampton, graduating in Economics (âDiplom-Volkswirtâ) and Business Administration (âDiplom -Kaufmannâ). Following his graduation, Marcus worked as a research assistant at the University of Frankfurt before moving to a management consultancy ï¬rm. Marcus qualiï¬ed as a CFA charterholder in 2009 and as a Financial Risk Manager (FRM) in 2002. He further qualiï¬ed as a Chartered Alternative Investment Analyst (CAIA) in 2012.

0P00000TXI.F.summary:
Principale investimento in azioni, ivi inclusi OICR aperti (OICVM e FIA aperti non riservati) azionari, denominati in Euro, Dollaro, Yen e Sterlina.

0P00000U7Q.F.summary:

0P00000U87.F.summary:
Il Fondo investe in strumenti finanziari di natura azionaria, obbligazionaria e monetaria denominati in euro e/o in altre valute. Il Fondo puÃ² detenere titoli azionari anche stabilmente fino al 100% del portafoglio. Con riferimento agli investimenti obbligazionari, la SGR puÃ² acquistare obbligazioni e titoli di debito, finalizzati esclusivamente a finanziare progetti con specifici benefici o impatti di natura ambientale (c.d. âGreen Bondsâ) e/o sociale (c.d. âSocial Bondsâ). La SGR puÃ² ridurre lâesposizione azionaria fino ad un minimo del 40% del portafoglio del Fondo. Il Fondo predilige investimenti in emittenti caratterizzati da elevati standard ESG (Environmental, Social and Governance), con particolare attenzione a quelli ambientali.
La SGR puÃ² investire in OICR in misura significativa. Il Fondo puÃ² investire in OICR di societÃ  collegate in misura contenuta.

0P00000Z9X.F.manager_bio: Cordula Bauss is a senior portfolio manager within the Active Allocation Retail team of Allianz Global Investors Multi Asset Europe, based in Frankfurt. She manages multi asset funds and heads up the FX team in Multi Asset. She also manages the currency overlay strategy for selected portfolios. Cordula joined the firm in 1997 as an analyst for currencies and became a portfolio manager for currency portfolios, currency overlay mandates and emerging markets debt local currencies. In 2008 she began managing balanced portfolios. She started her career as an editor with Finanzen-Verlag in Munich in 1994. Cordula graduated with a university degree in Economics (âDiplom-Volkswirtinâ) from the University of GÃ¶ttingen.

0P0000274T.F.manager_bio: An Economics graduate from the Universidad Complutense in Madrid and Official Accounts Auditor for the REA, he began his professional career in 1989 as an auditor and consultant at Arthur Andersen specialising in the financial sector. In 1994, he joined Morgan Stanley as an analyst responsible for the Spanish and European financial sector, receiving various awards from specialised international publications. In 1999 he was appointed Managing Director of Equity Analysis at Fortis Bank EspaÃ±a, where he had both local and international responsibilities. In 2003 he became responsible for a domestic Family Office and in 2006 he was appointed CEO of B.Madrid Asset Management. Juan is also an Associate Professor at the Universidad Carlos III in Madrid since 2003.

0P00002AFK.F.summary: The investment seeks to maximise the performance of listed international equities. The fund invests at least 60% of large- and mid-cap equities. It may invest up to 40% of assets in private and public bonds with a minimum rating of BBB(S&P) and a duration smaller than 10 years ; but also negotiable debt securities and money market instruments with a minimum rating of A3 (S&P) and a duration smaller than 3 months. The fund may invest up to 10% of assets in emerging countries equities.

0P000147UJ.F.summary:
Il Fondo investe in strumenti finanziari di natura azionaria, obbligazionaria e monetaria denominati in euro e/o in altre valute. Il Fondo puÃ² detenere titoli azionari anche stabilmente fino al 100% del portafoglio. Con riferimento agli investimenti obbligazionari, la SGR puÃ² acquistare obbligazioni e titoli di debito, finalizzati esclusivamente a finanziare progetti con specifici benefici o impatti di natura ambientale (c.d. âGreen Bondsâ) e/o sociale (c.d. âSocial Bondsâ). La SGR puÃ² ridurre lâesposizione azionaria fino ad un minimo del 40% del portafoglio del Fondo. Il Fondo predilige investimenti in emittenti caratterizzati da elevati standard ESG (Environmental, Social and Governance), con particolare attenzione a quelli ambientali.
La SGR puÃ² investire in OICR in misura significativa. Il Fondo puÃ² investire in OICR di societÃ  collegate in misura contenuta.
Il Fondo puÃ² investire in fondi chiusi nei limiti di legge.
Il Fondo puÃ² investire in depositi bancari in misura residuale.

0P000149HM.F.manager_bio: Cordula Bauss is a senior portfolio manager within the Active Allocation Retail team of Allianz Global Investors Multi Asset Europe, based in Frankfurt. She manages multi asset funds and heads up the FX team in Multi Asset. She also manages the currency overlay strategy for selected portfolios. Cordula joined the firm in 1997 as an analyst for currencies and became a portfolio manager for currency portfolios, currency overlay mandates and emerging markets debt local currencies. In 2008 she began managing balanced portfolios. She started her career as an editor with Finanzen-Verlag in Munich in 1994. Cordula graduated with a university degree in Economics (âDiplom-Volkswirtinâ) from the University of GÃ¶ttingen.

0P000162RA.F.summary: The investment objective of the Fund is to generate capital growth by investing in an internationally diversified portfolio of shares and units in collective investment schemes and individual high quality fixed interest instruments.
0P000162RA.F.manager_bio: Mark is an Investment Director at Collins Stewart. He is part of the multi-manager team providing discretionary portfolio management to institutions, intermediaries and private clients. In addition, Mark is Chairman of Collins Stewart Wealth Management's Fund Selection Committee and co-manages several of the group's Select range of multi-manager, multi-asset funds. Mark is a Chartered Fellow of the Chartered Institute for Securities and Investment. Prior to joining Collins Stewart in September 1998, he spent 10 years at Old Mutual International where his responsibilities included the management of their Elite offshore fund umbrella, as well as a selection of private client portfolios and life funds.

ASNO.AS.summary: Het doel van het ASN Duurzaam Mixfonds Offensief is om via beleggingsinstellingen te beleggen in beursgenoteerde en niet-beursgenoteerde aandelen, obligaties en onderhandse leningen. Deze financiÃ«le instrumenten moeten zijn uitgegeven door ondernemingen, organisaties en overheden die voldoen aan de ASN Duurzaamheidscriteria van ASN Beleggingsfondsen N.V. Per beleggingsinstelling gelden er bandbreedtes waarbinnen belegd mag worden. Het beleggingsbeleid van het ASN Duurzaam Mixfonds Offensief is gericht op vermogensgroei op de lange termijn.

ASNZO.AS.summary: Het doel van het ASN Duurzaam Mixfonds Zeer Offensief is om via beleggingsinstellingen te beleggen in beursgenoteerde en niet-beursgenoteerde aandelen, obligaties en onderhandse leningen. Deze financiÃ«le instrumenten moeten zijn uitgegeven door ondernemingen, organisaties en overheden die voldoen aan de ASN Duurzaamheidscriteria van ASN Beleggingsfondsen N.V. Per beleggingsinstelling gelden er bandbreedtes waarbinnen belegd mag worden. Het beleggingsbeleid van het ASN Duurzaam Mixfonds Zeer Offensief is gericht op vermogensgroei op de lange termijn.

AVMO.AS.summary:
The investment objective is to achieve a return at least equal to the composite benchmark and at the same time to realise an ESG score for the fund that is as high as possible. The benchmark consists of: 25% of the composite benchmark of Euro Obligatiepool, 65% of the composite benchmark of Global Equity Mixpool and 10% GPR Sustainable Real Estate Index Europe.
Investment policy.
 ACTIAM Duurzaam Mixfonds Offensief invests in bonds and listed equities/real estate. The fund does not pursue its own foreign exchange policy. This is done in the underlying investment pools.
 Companies, governments and institutions in the fund are assessed on their environmental, social and governance performance (ESG criteria). A negative assessment may lead to the exclusion of companies or debtors. In case of doubt, engagement can be initiated to encourage improvement.
